name: Not those monsters again...
description:
This is a mini-game I'm working on during my free time.
It's a Shoot'em up where you're playing a sorcerer trying to find it's way out.

The goal ames to be played in short session, the main goal is to get the highest score.
Rooms are choosen randomly from a set of levels.

The the game is fully playable, but I will probably polish things a bit in the future.
Don't hesitate to add suggestions in the comments, maybe i'll have a bit of time to implement them :).

Credits:
- Music: Ludum Dare 32 - Track 1(music-loop-bundle) from Tallbeard Studios
- Sprite of the mage/sorcerer: from the 1-bit-dungeon-brawler-asset-pack from StevePixelFace
